channel.title: Native Seed Library | Lebanon Public Library
channel.description: Recent content on Native Seed Library | Lebanon Public Library

item.title: Collecting Your Seeds
item.description: This class will dive into watching plants for signs of seed maturity, techniques for bagging and seed removal, and proper seed storage to ensure viability of seeds in the spring.

item.title: Planning A Pollinator Garden
item.description: This class covers pollinator garden basics: from site preparation and selecting caterpillar host plants and butterfly nectar plants to ensuring the garden has a long season of blooms.

item.title: Seed Starting Basics
item.description: Learn how to cold stratify seeds to increase germination rates, as well as different methods of growing seeds come spring.

item.title: Tending the Native Garden
item.description: This class covers garden maintenance, planting and pruning techniques for the native perennial garden.
